Class ConfigurableBlockFluidClassic

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry.Impl<net.minecraft.block.Block>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraftforge.fluids.IFluidBlock, net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.block.Block>, IEntityDropParticleFXBlock, IConfigurable<BlockConfig>, IConfigurableBlock

    public abstract class ConfigurableBlockFluidClassic
extends net.minecraftforge.fluids.BlockFluidClassic
implements IConfigurableBlock, IEntityDropParticleFXBlock
    Block that represents an in-world fluid that can hold ExtendedConfigs
